properties.name: Alden
properties.description: Posted by NospamspringfelsNottingham, PA 19362Alden is a 13 year old, 16.1h TB mare. She is a training packer and has won many ribbons including a 5th at the training three day last fall. She is handy and a terrific jumper and would give someone great confidence. She would make a great level 2/3/4 jumper as well. For more information contact Courtney at 610.932.5832 or by email csquarefarm@yahoo.com Additional photos are available on www.csquarefarm.com

properties.name: Lane Four
properties.description: Posted by NospamspringfelsEllicot City, MDLane Four, aka Jerry, is a 3-year-old, 16H bay TB gelding. Jerry is a horse with a big future ahead of him. Coupling his quiet attitude, great work ethic and raw talent with being a genuine easy ride, Jerry is anyone\'s dream horse. ,500. 540-272-3273 or HDGCS@aol.com. Additional photos available at www.sunsethilleventing.net. 500 16hh 4 yo

properties.name: MAINWAYS JESSICA
properties.description: Posted by NospamspringfelsRaphine, Virginia 2447212k , 8 years, 16.3 JESS is an absolute sweetheart. very personable, affectionate and talented. * won eventing with an amateur, attended PC thro\' C3, O\' Conner clinics etc.. *foxhunts superbly in any field, front or back *smooth, bold scopey jump 4\'6" + *beautifully schooled, snaffle mouth, 3 cadenced easy paces *easy keeper, in or out, no vices, very sound, exc. clip, shoe, catch etc. Jess is very genuine and will help her rider out every time. Does water, ditches, drops , is a straightforward, uncomplicated pleasure to ride, and have around the barn. I have known this mare all her life. For sale as her owner is off to college and has given up horses. www.evanssporthorses.com

properties.name: Neon Knight
properties.description: Posted by NospamspringfelsAldie, VA 20105Not only is Neon a confidence builder, but he is competitive at the local horse shows, and dressage shows. A/A owner has evented him in low level horse trials, done the local horse show circuit, and shown him Training Level/First Level Dressage. He is very comfortable to ride on the flat, and easy to ride o/f. Neon would be a great move up from a pony, or a good mount for a nervous rider. He is a cute mover and pins consistently. http://web.mac.com/tcatledge1/iWeb/Tailwind%20Farm/Neon.html

properties.name: gimlet
properties.description: Posted by Nospamspringfels Poolesville, Maryland 2083712.5k, 15.3, 11 yrs, This lovely gelding has evented through Novice and easily can go Training now. He\'s bold and honest but rateable. He\'s short coupled, built enough uphill to get some lovely dressage work. Scored in mid 20\'s last outting. He is also quite correct over fences and very consistant. He is nice enough for local/B rated hunters. Rides in a snaffle, has no vices and is 100% sound. CALLS to 202-812-8541

properties.name: mohegan
properties.description: Posted by NospamspringfelsMaryland 2190112k Mo is a safe, fun horse. He is currently competing BN eventing but has schooled up to Training. Always scores in the mid 20\'s to low 30\'s - judges love him! Clinic w/ Jimmy Wofford and has trained w/ Bruce Davidson who said Mo can go at least Prelim. Mo clips, bathes, ties, loads, and stands for the farrier. Don\'t miss out on this great horse. A good home is a must. Pictures available upon request.

properties.name: tiga
properties.description: Posted by NospamspringfelsCentreville, Maryland 2161712k, temp-5, 15.2, 10yrs 10 yr old Silver Tobiano Paint/TB Cross mare. Tiga has been successfully evented at Recognized Beginner Novice, Novice, & Training Level events. She is consistent, athletic, dependable, and pleasant. She is not mare-ish. Great movement and comfortable in the dressage ring. She will look out for you. Great feet, good work ethic, and excellent manners. No vices, QUIET, and sound. She has won a house full of ribbons and could excel in any discipline. She was the only horse to jump clean at her last Rec. Training level event. She has had years of top-notch training by the best, and is currently in training and fit for show. I have had Tiga since she was 4 and am only selling her due to pregnancy. She is a do-everything kind of family horse. N/T Event video available for serious inquiries.

properties.name: whip
properties.description: Posted by Nospamspringfels15045 Peregrine Drive, Amissville Virginia 20106 ,500 (US) A quiet, mannerly Thoroughbred, "Whip" is a brilliant mover with a wonderful canter & beautiful jumping form. This SCHOOL MASTER HAS DONE IT ALL. He has won Training level horse trials, he is suitable for lower level eventing, and dressage with potiential for more, is a nice enough mover for the show hunter ring,& has fox hunting experience. Walk In The Park\'s USEA # is 20,000 (even). Whip\'s Further accomplishments with his junior rider include; Pony Club competitions through C-2, experience & ribbons at dressage schooling shows, numerous Novice Level Horse Trials Placings (ALWAYS in the ribbons in the recognized events)through 2nd with scores as low as 29.5 and Pony Club National Champion in Tetrathlon. Whip is a great horse to just go have fun on and let the rider work on there own riding skills instead of the horse\'s skills! Priced VERY fair for so much experience. Please see web for more pics www.fineequin2002.com Whip is not high strung at shows at all. He also fox hunts very well. His Usef# is 20000 if you want to see his scores. He has done very well showing dressage from what I know. He is a working 2nd level. He wears shoes all the way around. He goes in a waterford bit. He is not on any supplements at this time. He jumps 3\'3 to 3\'6 very comfortable. He is not prone to lameness issues. Whip is very well educated and will not tolerate any one hanging all over his mouth. That is about the worse vise he has. So soft hands are important. He knows his job inside and out. His owner is selling him because he belonged to her daughter who is off to college. She is the one who has done the great stuff with him as a junior. You are also welcome to talk with Debrah as well about any of his history( his owner). Just let me know when you want to come over and try him to see if it is a good match. We are around all next week. Feel free to call or email and happy holidays!!

properties.name: yankee boy
properties.description: Posted by Nospamspringfels21154,500 (US). Mr. D Man aka Yankee Boy - Flashy 6 y.o. 16.1h chestnut w/ white TB gelding by Horatius (Clever Secret). Kind, Quiet & brave w/ 3 v.good gaits and sporty looks. Well started w/ dressage trng and schooling 2\'6"+ fences, logs, etc. Very quiet to his fences. Would also do well in the hunt field - Does not get rattled! Great to work around. Big bone, well built, great feet, no vices. Must sell ,500 please call 410-836-1114 or email for more info.
